# influxdb Provider

The InfluxDB provider allows Terraform to manage InfluxDB resources such as buckets, tasks, and checks.

## Example Usage

```terraform
terraform {
  required_providers {
    influxdb = {
      source  = "xing/influxdb"
      version = "~> 0.1"
    }
  }
}

provider "influxdb" {
  url   = "http://localhost:8086"
  token = "your-influxdb-token"
  org   = "your-org"
}
```

## Schema

### Optional

- `bucket` (String) Default bucket name
- `org` (String) Default organization name or ID
- `token` (String) InfluxDB authentication token
- `url` (String) InfluxDB server URL
